Package org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor

Class Editor<T extends Editable>

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor.Editor<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the editable object
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutomatonEditor, FormulaEditor, InputSimulatorViewer, RunDagViewer, RunTreeViewer, SplitTreeViewer
public abstract class Editor<T extends Editable>
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.print.Printable
An Editor is a panel that can display an editable object and perform some editing.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
